snippet: Braden Holtby has gone 29 consecutive starts — including 13 in the playoffs — without losing back-to-back games.
abstract: Washington Capitals rookie goalie Braden Holtby has been pivotal part in the team's success; Washington's 2-1 victory over the New York Rangers in Game 6 of their playoff series marks Holtby's 29th consecutive start, including 13 in the playoffs, without losing back-to-back games.
lead_paragraph: Braden Holtby has gone 29 consecutive starts — including 13 in the playoffs — without losing back-to-back games.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Playoffs — Capitals’ Braden Holtby Has All the Answers
headline.main: Washington’s Rookie Goalie Has All the Answers
headline.print_headline: Washington’s Rookie Goalie Has All the Answers
